document_name: FOR_RESUB_4131 Russia EE NW EE Bldgs prodoc_v9_Aug_9_2010.doc
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/RUS/00059438/FOR_RESUB_4131 Russia EE NW EE Bldgs prodoc_v9_Aug_9_2010.doc

outputs.output_descr: The project objective is to build local capacities for and demonstrate local solutions to improved energy efficiency in new and existing buildings in the North West of Russia: Pskov, Vologda and Arkhangelsk Oblasts. The project objective will be achieved through the following three components: 1) An enabling environment and enforcement capacities for improved energy efficiency at  the provincial and local levels; 2) Capacity building and know-how; and 3) Demonstration of local energy-efficient solutions and management models.

project_descr: Buildings energy efficiency in the North West of Russia
project_title: Building EE in North West of Russia
